instruction: Develop a user interface in python tkinter to add, modify, and delete items from a list.
buggy_code:
import tkinter as tk

win = tk.Tk()
win.title("list operations")

data = []

def add_item():
    data.append(txt_input.get())
    refresh_list()
    
def delete_item():
    return
    data.remove(lst_data.get(tk.ACTIVE))
    refresh_list()

def modify_item():
    data[lst_data.curselection()[0]] = txt_input.get()
    refresh_list()
        
def refresh_list():
    lst_data.delete(0, tk.END)
    for item in data:
        lst_data.insert(tk.END, item)

frm_list = tk.Frame(win)
lbl_input = tk.Label(frm_list, text="Input")
txt_input = tk.Entry(frm_list, width=15)

lbl_input.grid(row=0, column=0)
txt_input.grid(row=0, column=1)

lst_data = tk.Listbox(frm_list, height=5)
lst_data.grid(row=1, column=0, columnspan=2)

btn_add = tk.Button(frm_list, text="add", command=add_item)
btn_delete = tk.Button(frm_list, text="delete", command=delete_item)
btn_modify = tk.Button(frm_list, text="modify", command=modify_item)
btn_add.grid(row=2, column=0)
btn_delete.grid(row=2, column=1)
btn_modify.grid(row=2, column=2)

frm_list.grid(row=0, column=0)

win.mainloop()
